Verify the alert message is positioned fixed with top 20px, left 50%, transform 'translateX(-50%)'
Verify the alert message has background-color #dc3545, color #ffffff, border-radius 5px, padding 15px, max-width 400px, z-index 1020, opacity 1, text-align 'center', line-height 1.5
Verify the alert message remains visible for 5 seconds before fading out with animation-duration 500ms
Click the 'Language' dropdown

Verify the menu appears with width 150px, max-height 200px, border 1px solid #ccc, background-color #ffffff, box-shadow '0px 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)', z-index 900, overflow-y 'auto', offset-parent is the dropdown container
Verify the 'English' option is selected, has background-color #e9ecef
Verify each menu item has padding 10px, font-size 16px
Verify the 'Français' option has color #333333, cursor 'pointer'
Open 'https://www.home.com'
Verify the main hero carousel contains 3 slides
Verify the active slide image 'slide_01.jpg' is fully loaded, has naturalWidth 1920px, naturalHeight 1080px
Verify the 'Next' button is visible, clickable, has aria-label 'Next slide'
Verify the carousel container width is 100vw, height 500px
Verify each slide has background-size 'cover', background-position 'center'
Verify the slide transition animation-duration is 800ms
Verify the dot indicators are display 'flex' with justify-content 'center'
Verify the z-index of navigation arrows is 50
Open 'https://dash.example.com'

Verify the 'Sales Summary' widget has width 300px, height 250px, border-radius 8px, background-color #ffffff, padding 20px, box-shadow '0px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)', offset-parent is the main dashboard grid
Verify the title 'Sales Summary' has font-size 20px, font-weight 600, color #333333
Verify the sales value '€12,345' has font-size 36px, letter-spacing -1px
Verify the chart inside uses fill for data points and stroke for lines
Verify line-height of text is 1.2
Scroll to the bottom of 'https://corporate.example.com'
Verify the footer section has background-color #333333, color #cccccc, padding 40px 0px, min-height 150px, offset-height 200px, overflow-y 'hidden'
Verify the copyright text '© 2023 Example Corp.' has font-size 14px, text-align 'center'
Verify social media icons are display 'inline-block', have margin-right 15px
Verify the 'Privacy Policy' link has href 'https://corporate.example.com/privacy', font-weight 400
Verify the row-gap between footer links is 10px
Initiate a data fetch operation
Verify a loading spinner appears, positioned fixed at top 50%, left 50% with transform 'translate(-50%, -50%)'

Verify the loading spinner has color #007bff, width 40px, height 40px, animation property with duration 1s and iteration-count 'infinite', z-index 1000, border 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1), border-top-color #007bff, border-radius 50%, opacity 1, offset-width 40px, offset-height 40px, clip 'auto'
Open 'https://app.example.com/user/profile'
Verify the user's profile picture 'user_avatar.png' is loaded, has width 100px, height 100px, border-radius 50%
Verify the user's profile picture background-color is #e0e0e0 if no image is present
Verify the username 'John Doe' has font-size 28px, font-weight 700, color #222222
Verify the 'Edit Profile' button is enabled, has background-color #6c757d, padding 8px 16px
Verify the 'Last Login' timestamp displays in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS GMT' format
Verify the page content max-width is 960px
Verify line-height for paragraphs is 1.7
Verify letter-spacing is 0.5px
Verify min-width of the main container is 320px for mobile
Open 'https://devblog.example.com/code-snippets'

Verify the code block containing 'console.log('Hello');' has background-color #f8f8f8, padding 15px, border-left 5px solid #007bff, font-family 'Menlo', font-size 14px, line-height 1.6, text color #333333, word-spacing 0px, overflow-x 'auto', border-radius 4px, min-height 100px, offset-width 600px
